akn:section.akn:heading: Application for license, registration, or certification.

akn:content.akn:p: An applicant for a license, registration, or certification shall:

The social security number of each applicant for a license, registration, or certification issued pursuant to this chapter shall be recorded on the application. If a number other than the social security number is used on the face of the license, registration, or certification, the issuing agency or entity shall keep the applicantâ€™s social security number on file and the applicant shall be so advised.
